divs: sighting detailsi was driving west, sun was setting it was about 8:20 pm on 4-26-12 and i thought it was a chem trail but it wasn't getting any longer, so i thought i must be getting glare of my windshield or vehicle so i moved my head around and what i thought was some kind of glare never moved or disappeared. i kept an eye on it and it suddenly tipped it's side closest to me downward and that is when i could see it was an oblong saucer shape. it was glassy giving the appearance of being translucent with a dark tinted ring on top side that looked like a tinted window, a gray metallic edging outlined the outer edges. i had to curve to the south west and the sun was not shinning and i could still see it, then houses blocked my view for about a 1\4 of a mile and i turned west and it was no longer there, just nothing. this was over saginaw mi i couldn't tell you how big or high up, just it was way below clouds, i am not good at judging distance or size with nothing to compare it to beside it. i am 54 and have never seen an ufo in day light, but have seen strange lights at night and this was amazing i was in awwwww. as soon as i got home i had to call my friends and tell them. i am still in awwwwwwww.
Summary: glassy transparent like withgray metalic edging, oblong saucer with band of dark I took to look like a tinted window on skyward top side
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Saginaw
There were no other sightings in Saginaw on or around April 26th 2012
